title: Security for Software Development Managers (LFD125)
overview: This course equips software development managers with the knowledge and skills to integrate security best practices into the software development lifecycle. Participants will learn how to manage secure software development processes, assess security risks, and lead teams in building more secure software.
requirements: Familiarity with the software development lifecycle (SDLC)
Basic knowledge of software engineering practices
An understanding of project management principles
audience: This course is ideal for software development managers, project leaders, technical managers, and anyone responsible for overseeing secure software development in their organization.

details.certificate: Certificate of Completion and Digital Badge
